quoteText: There has to be a global mission of human progress.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quoteText: Poetry comes from the highest happiness or the deepest sorrow.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quoteText: Ultimately, education in its real sense is the pursuit of truth. It is an endless journey through knowledge and enlightenment.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quoteText: The youth need to be enabled to become job generators from job seekers.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quoteText: Building capacity dissolves differences. It irons out inequalities.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quoteText: Those who cannot work with their hearts achieve but a hollow, half-hearted success that breeds bitterness all around.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quoteText: One of the very important characteristics of a student is to question. Let the students ask questions.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quoteText: I was willing to accept what I couldn't change.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quoteText: No sanction can stand against ignited minds.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
